verses.verse: Thou shalt not <S%H3808><s%> raise <S%H5375><s%> a false <S%H7723><s%> report: <S%H8088><s%> put <S%H7896><s%> not <S%H408><s%> thine hand <S%H3027><s%> with <S%H5973><s%> the wicked <S%H7563><s%> to be <S%H1961><s%> an unrighteous <S%H2555><s%> witness. <S%H5707><s%>

Thou shalt not <S%H3808><s%> follow <S%H1961><s%> <S%H310><s%> a multitude <S%H7227><s%> to do evil; <S%H7451><s%> neither <S%H3808><s%> shalt thou speak <S%H6030><s%> in <S%H5921><s%> a cause <S%H7379><s%> to decline <S%H5186><s%> after <S%H310><s%> many <S%H7227><s%> to wrest <S%H5186><s%> judgment:
Neither <S%H3808><s%> shalt thou countenance <S%H1921><s%> a poor man <S%H1800><s%> in his cause. <S%H7379><s%>

If <S%H3588><s%> thou meet <S%H6293><s%> thine enemy's <S%H341><s%> ox <S%H7794><s%> or <S%H176><s%> his ass <S%H2543><s%> going astray, <S%H8582><s%> thou shalt surely bring it back to him again. <S%H7725><s%> <S%H7725><s%>

If <S%H3588><s%> thou see <S%H7200><s%> the ass <S%H2543><s%> of him that hateth <S%H8130><s%> thee lying <S%H7257><s%> under <S%H8478><s%> his burden, <S%H4853><s%> and wouldest forbear <S%H2308><s%> to help <S%H4480><s%> <S%H5800><s%> him, thou shalt surely help <S%H5800><s%> <S%H5800><s%> with <S%H5973><s%> him.
Thou shalt not <S%H3808><s%> wrest <S%H5186><s%> the judgment <S%H4941><s%> of thy poor <S%H34><s%> in his cause. <S%H7379><s%>

Keep thee far <S%H7368><s%> from a false matter; <S%H4480><s%> <S%H1697><s%> <S%H8267><s%> and the innocent <S%H5355><s%> and righteous <S%H6662><s%> slay <S%H2026><s%> thou not: <S%H408><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> I will not <S%H3808><s%> justify <S%H6663><s%> the wicked. <S%H7563><s%>

And thou shalt take <S%H3947><s%> no <S%H3808><s%> gift: <S%H7810><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> the gift <S%H7810><s%> blindeth <S%H5786><s%> the wise, <S%H6493><s%> and perverteth <S%H5557><s%> the words <S%H1697><s%> of the righteous. <S%H6662><s%>

Also thou shalt not <S%H3808><s%> oppress <S%H3905><s%> a stranger: <S%H1616><s%> for ye <S%H859><s%> know <S%H3045><s%> <S%H853><s%> the heart <S%H5315><s%> of a stranger, <S%H1616><s%> seeing <S%H3588><s%> ye were <S%H1961><s%> strangers <S%H1616><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt. <S%H4714><s%>
And six <S%H8337><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> thou shalt sow <S%H2232><s%> <S%H853><s%> thy land, <S%H776><s%> and shalt gather in <S%H622><s%> <S%H853><s%> the fruits <S%H8393><s%> thereof:

But the seventh <S%H7637><s%> year thou shalt let it rest <S%H8058><s%> and lie still; <S%H5203><s%> that the poor <S%H34><s%> of thy people <S%H5971><s%> may eat: <S%H398><s%> and what they leave <S%H3499><s%> the beasts <S%H2416><s%> of the field <S%H7704><s%> shall eat. <S%H398><s%> In like manner <S%H3651><s%> thou shalt deal <S%H6213><s%> with thy vineyard, <S%H3754><s%> and with thy oliveyard. <S%H2132><s%>

Six <S%H8337><s%> days <S%H3117><s%> thou shalt do <S%H6213><s%> thy work, <S%H4639><s%> and on the seventh <S%H7637><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> thou shalt rest: <S%H7673><s%> that <S%H4616><s%> thine ox <S%H7794><s%> and thine ass <S%H2543><s%> may rest, <S%H5117><s%> and the son <S%H1121><s%> of thy handmaid, <S%H519><s%> and the stranger, <S%H1616><s%> may be refreshed. <S%H5314><s%>

And in all <S%H3605><s%> things that <S%H834><s%> I have said <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> you be circumspect: <S%H8104><s%> and make no mention <S%H2142><s%> <S%H3808><s%> of the name <S%H8034><s%> of other <S%H312><s%> gods, <S%H430><s%> neither <S%H3808><s%> let it be heard <S%H8085><s%> out of <S%H5921><s%> thy mouth. <S%H6310><s%>
Three <S%H7969><s%> times <S%H7272><s%> thou shalt keep a feast <S%H2287><s%> unto me in the year. <S%H8141><s%>

Thou shalt keep <S%H8104><s%> <S%H853><s%> the feast <S%H2282><s%> of unleavened bread: <S%H4682><s%> (thou shalt eat <S%H398><s%> unleavened bread <S%H4682><s%> seven <S%H7651><s%> days, <S%H3117><s%> as <S%H834><s%> I commanded <S%H6680><s%> thee, in the time appointed <S%H4150><s%> of the month <S%H2320><s%> Abib; <S%H24><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> in it thou camest out <S%H3318><s%> from Egypt: <S%H4480><s%> <S%H4714><s%> and none <S%H3808><s%> shall appear <S%H7200><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> me empty: ) <S%H7387><s%>

And the feast <S%H2282><s%> of harvest, <S%H7105><s%> the firstfruits <S%H1061><s%> of thy labors, <S%H4639><s%> which <S%H834><s%> thou hast sown <S%H2232><s%> in the field: <S%H7704><s%> and the feast <S%H2282><s%> of ingathering, <S%H614><s%> which is in the end <S%H3318><s%> of the year, <S%H8141><s%> when thou hast gathered in <S%H622><s%> <S%H853><s%> thy labors <S%H4639><s%> out of <S%H4480><s%> the field. <S%H7704><s%>

Three <S%H7969><s%> times <S%H6471><s%> in the year <S%H8141><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> thy males <S%H2138><s%> shall appear <S%H7200><s%> before <S%H413><s%> <S%H6440><s%> the Lord <S%H113><s%> GOD. <S%H3068><s%>

Thou shalt not <S%H3808><s%> offer <S%H2076><s%> the blood <S%H1818><s%> of my sacrifice <S%H2077><s%> with <S%H5921><s%> leavened bread; <S%H2557><s%> neither <S%H3808><s%> shall the fat <S%H2459><s%> of my sacrifice <S%H2282><s%> remain <S%H3885><s%> until <S%H5704><s%> the morning. <S%H1242><s%>

The first <S%H7225><s%> of the firstfruits <S%H1061><s%> of thy land <S%H127><s%> thou shalt bring <S%H935><s%> into the house <S%H1004><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> thy God. <S%H430><s%> Thou shalt not <S%H3808><s%> seethe <S%H1310><s%> a kid <S%H1423><s%> in his mother's <S%H517><s%> milk. <S%H2461><s%>

Behold, <S%H2009><s%> I <S%H595><s%> send <S%H7971><s%> an Angel <S%H4397><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> thee, to keep <S%H8104><s%> thee in the way, <S%H1870><s%> and to bring <S%H935><s%> thee into <S%H413><s%> the place <S%H4725><s%> which <S%H834><s%> I have prepared. <S%H3559><s%>

Beware <S%H8104><s%> of <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6440><s%> him, and obey <S%H8085><s%> his voice, <S%H6963><s%> provoke <S%H4843><s%> him not; <S%H408><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> he will not <S%H3808><s%> pardon <S%H5375><s%> your transgressions: <S%H6588><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> my name <S%H8034><s%> is in <S%H7130><s%> him.

But <S%H3588><s%> if <S%H518><s%> thou shalt indeed obey <S%H8085><s%> <S%H8085><s%> his voice, <S%H6963><s%> and do <S%H6213><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> that <S%H834><s%> I speak; <S%H1696><s%> then I will be an enemy <S%H340><s%> <S%H853><s%> unto thine enemies, <S%H341><s%> and an adversary <S%H6696><s%> <S%H853><s%> unto thine adversaries. <S%H6887><s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> mine Angel <S%H4397><s%> shall go <S%H1980><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> thee, and bring thee in <S%H935><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> the Amorites, <S%H567><s%> and the Hittites, <S%H2850><s%> and the Perizzites, <S%H6522><s%> and the Canaanites, <S%H3669><s%> the Hivites, <S%H2340><s%> and the Jebusites: <S%H2983><s%> and I will cut them off. <S%H3582><s%>

Thou shalt not <S%H3808><s%> bow down <S%H7812><s%> to their gods, <S%H430><s%> nor <S%H3808><s%> serve <S%H5647><s%> them, nor <S%H3808><s%> do <S%H6213><s%> after their works: <S%H4639><s%> but <S%H3588><s%> thou shalt utterly overthrow <S%H2040><s%> <S%H2040><s%> them, and quite break down <S%H7665><s%> <S%H7665><s%> their images. <S%H4676><s%>

And ye shall serve <S%H5647><s%> <S%H853><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> your God, <S%H430><s%> and he shall bless <S%H1288><s%> <S%H853><s%> thy bread, <S%H3899><s%> and thy water; <S%H4325><s%> and I will take sickness away <S%H5493><s%> <S%H4245><s%> from the midst <S%H4480><s%> <S%H7130><s%> of thee.

There shall nothing <S%H3808><s%> cast their young, <S%H1961><s%> <S%H7921><s%> nor be barren, <S%H6135><s%> in thy land: <S%H776><s%> <S%H853><s%> the number <S%H4557><s%> of thy days <S%H3117><s%> I will fulfill. <S%H4390><s%>

I will send <S%H7971><s%> <S%H853><s%> my fear <S%H367><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> thee, and will destroy <S%H2000><s%> <S%H853><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> to whom <S%H834><s%> thou shalt come, <S%H935><s%> and I will make <S%H5414><s%> <S%H853><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> thine enemies <S%H341><s%> turn their backs <S%H6203><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> thee.

And I will send <S%H7971><s%> <S%H853><s%> hornets <S%H6880><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> thee, which shall drive out <S%H1644><s%> <S%H853><s%> the Hivite, <S%H2340><s%> <S%H853><s%> the Canaanite, <S%H3669><s%> and the Hittite, <S%H2850><s%> from before <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6440><s%> thee.

I will not <S%H3808><s%> drive them out <S%H1644><s%> from before <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6440><s%> thee in one <S%H259><s%> year; <S%H8141><s%> lest <S%H6435><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> become <S%H1961><s%> desolate, <S%H8077><s%> and the beast <S%H2416><s%> of the field <S%H7704><s%> multiply <S%H7227><s%> against <S%H5921><s%> thee.

By little <S%H4592><s%> and little <S%H4592><s%> I will drive them out <S%H1644><s%> from before <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6440><s%> thee, until <S%H5704><s%> <S%H834><s%> thou be increased, <S%H6509><s%> and inherit <S%H5157><s%> <S%H853><s%> the land. <S%H776><s%>

And I will set <S%H7896><s%> <S%H853><s%> thy bounds <S%H1366><s%> from the Red sea <S%H4480><s%> <S%H3220><s%> <S%H5488><s%> even unto <S%H5704><s%> the sea <S%H3220><s%> of the Philistines, <S%H6430><s%> and from the desert <S%H4480><s%> <S%H4057><s%> unto <S%H5704><s%> the river: <S%H5104><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> I will deliver <S%H5414><s%> <S%H853><s%> the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%> into your hand; <S%H3027><s%> and thou shalt drive them out <S%H1644><s%> before <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6440><s%> thee.
Thou shalt make <S%H3772><s%> no <S%H3808><s%> covenant <S%H1285><s%> with them, nor with their gods. <S%H430><s%>

They shall not <S%H3808><s%> dwell <S%H3427><s%> in thy land, <S%H776><s%> lest <S%H6435><s%> they make thee sin <S%H2398><s%> <S%H853><s%> against me: for <S%H3588><s%> if thou serve <S%H5647><s%> <S%H853><s%> their gods, <S%H430><s%> it will surely <S%H3588><s%> be <S%H1961><s%> a snare <S%H4170><s%> unto thee.
